mapper.select: SELECT product_no AS productNo, product_brand AS productBrand, product_name AS productName, product_img AS productImg, stock AS stock, TO_CHAR(receive_dt, 'YYYY . MM . DD') AS receiveDt, receive_loc AS receiveLoc FROM product where receive_dt >= SYSDATE and receive_loc=#{storeName}

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN b.PRODUCT_STATUS = 'false' THEN 1 END) AS notReceive, COUNT(CASE WHEN b.PRODUCT_STATUS = 'true' THEN 1 END) AS Receive FROM product a JOIN PRODUCT_HISTORY b ON a.PRODUCT_NO = b.PRODUCT_NO WHERE a.product_no = #{productNo} GROUP BY a.PRODUCT_NO
